body.name: Kitchbai 4K USB Document Camera for Teacher, 8MP Webcam & Visualiser for A3 Size with Dual Microphones, 3-Level LED Light, Image Invert, Foldable for Live Demo, Work with Windows, macOS and Chrome OS
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 18 mins
features: Document Camera with adjustable image reversal: The camera that can manually adjust image reversal. In video chat or image output, the image can be freely adjusted left/right and up/down; you can also manually adjust the reversed image that appears in the device to a normal image

Adjustable Image Brightness: the doc camera has brightness buttons, you can manually adjust the image brightness with 10 degree, to make sure that you can get the clear image. 3 levels of brightness adjustable, which can eliminate shooting problems under difficult lighting conditions, allowing you to capture objects in dark and bright environments, and it can also achieve Selfie fill-in function

Foldable document camera for teachers: embedded design, occupies a small space after folding, easy to carry; Multi-joint support with multi-angle rotate freely usb camera can capture 2D and 3D objects better and shooting high-definition images and videos. Maximum covering area: 16.5" x 116" in (A3 paper)

8MP document cameras with 30fps: using High-end image sensor, it output ultra-high-definition images and videos live transmission, up to 2448P megapixels. Press the focus button once to automatically focus the document camera once. Moving the object under the lens, the camera will not be arbitrary automatic focus and the image dance. Macro can capture objects as close as 3.94"

Plug-n-Play & High Compatibility: the doc camera for teachers comes with a USB-C cable that allows for instant plug-and-play operation for distance education and web conferencing. It applicable to Windows PCS (Windows 7/8/10/11) , Macs (OS10.11 or higher), and Chromebooks(38.00 or higher), and work with Tiktok, Google Meet, Skyp-Microsoft Teams, Zoom; it has built-in dual silicon microphones, which can reduce noise and improve sound quality

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 670 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features of Kitchbai Document Camera: Image rotation (up and down, left and right), mirroring function, auto focus, 3-level LED light, 10-level brightness adjustment. These functions can be realized through the camera's own buttons, without softwareThe usb document camera is fully compatible with Windows 7/8/10/11, Mac 10.11 or later, Chrome 38.0 or later, and integrates seamlessly with all mainstream webinar appsKitchbai Visualiser is plug-and-play compatible with most webinar software packages: the camera works seamlessly with webinar software applications like Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Cisco Webex, GoToMeeting, Insig, and more Fix mirroring issues: Most webinar software mirrors the image at the host-end by default. You can take advantage of the Kitchbai document camera invert button to get a normal and intuitive image

3-in-1 Document camera & Visualiser and Webcam: Use real-time image capture to bring new levels of engagement to your lectures and classroom presentations. The lens module can be face down like a document camera to capture documents and handwritten notes, and face up can be used as a high definition PC camera for web meetings 3-in-1 School, Home and office function: The compact base design frees up desktop space, allowing you to use it in different environments. At home, use it with webinar software for distance education. In schools, use it to capture small objects and project teaching materials on a big screen. In the office, use it to optimize participation in presentations and web conferences (Folding and portable) Full HD panorama (2448p): Use the Kitchbai multifunction camera to create promotional and educational videos, teach in the classroom and online, participate in video conferences, give live demonstrations, provide remote assistance. Whatever the use, the picture and sound quality is always crisp and clear Adjustable arm and 270 degree rotating camera: The adjustable arm allows you to freely move the camera to various positions. Rotate the camera 270 degrees to easily find the perfect lens Compact, lightweight and height adjustable: Easy to carry, weighs 665 grams, with Folding arms, you can easily carry it with you. The unique structure of the multi-articulated arm and rotatable camera allows you to capture images and videos from all angles

Mirror left and right button: When making a video call, recording a video, or taking a picture, the picture obtained is not normal, and the picture is left and right reversed, then you don’t need general video software to set it up, you can directly use the "left and right reverse" on thustar document camera. Turn the button to adjust, and click the button of “left and right reverse” to get the image you want Large A3 Shooting Area: The Kitchbai equipped with an adjustable height mechanical arm. It allows you to capture larger A3 documents, books, and present anything you want from any angle Maximum catch area: A3 It can better capture 2D and 3D objects, shoot high definition pictures and videos. Maximum coverage area: 16.5 "x 11.6" (A3 paper) Mirror up and down button: When making a video call, recording a video or taking a picture, the picture obtained is not normal, and the picture is upside down, then you don’t need general video software to set it up, you can directly use the "Up and Down" button on thustar document camera "Button to adjust, click the "Up and Down" button to get the image you want

3-levels adjustable brightness: The camera comes with 14 ring lamp beads, 3-levels adjustable brightness, which can eliminate the trouble of shooting in difficult lighting conditions, allowing you to capture objects in dark and bright environments, and also can realize selfie filling function Adjustable Image Brightness: USB camera has brightness (+) and brightness (-) buttons, you can manually adjust the image brightness with 10 degree, to ensure you get a clear picture(+) Button: brightness adjustable to 10 degrees(-) Button: brightness adjustable to 10 degrees
Universal Systems Compatibility: Software supporting Windows PC, Macs,and ChromebooksCompatible for E-Learning/Online Lesson App: Tiktok, Google Meet, Skyp, Microsoft Teams, Zoom

The document camera is compatible with Tiktok, Zoom, Skype, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, FaceTime, etc. ! You can start a video conference with doc cam in 3 steps: Step 1: Plug in the computer. It will be automatically detected. No need to install any drivers or other softwareStep 2: Launch the desired video sharing appStep 3: In the settings menu, change the camera source to "Stream Camera" and you can start using it.Finally: Image resolution can be adjusted as you need
Perfect for using in different scenes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love how it can be WIDE ANGLE!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my classroom. I teach English Language Arts and I need to be able to demonstrate many different concepts in reading and writing. Because I'm a teacher and I don't get paid much, I was very hesitate to pay for a doc camera out of pocket. But I am so SO grateful for this doc camera because it is budget friendly.It also gets the job done! Since the image can show a wide angle, I am able to project my interactive notebook example for my students to follow along with my demonstration. I am also able to zoom in to any text or image that I want to emphasize, without giving up too much of the image quality.I use the Visualizer app to "project" my documents on my 70" TV screen. Using the app is very user friendly! The only thing I was a little sad about was the picture quality when zoomed in. The zoom is AMAZING, however the image quality is pixelated on my tv screen when zoomed in too much. But I'm not mad about it at all. I mention this in case people are expecting it to be super crystal clear if they use a 4k tv as their teaching screen. (Projectors are becoming outdated...)All in all, I'm just so grateful that I was able to find a doc camera that is cheap, gets the job done, sleek (it can fold up nicely!), and can project a wide angle so it can capture as much as your document as possible! Highly recommend for any educator at ALL levels--primary to university!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No complaints - Flexible, quality camera for a good price
reviews.reviewText: This camera is exactly what I was looking for and at a good price point. Video and images are of good quality. The design of the camera allows it to be easily manipulated to best capture documents. Interface easy to work with to modify its settings. Sturdy, weighted base so that the camera doesn't easily fall over. Built-in light works solidly as well. Again, no complaints. Happy to have purchased and would recommend to someone looking for the same or a similar product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tool for tutoring sessions!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son's online math tutoring sessions per the tutors request so that she can see him writing out the math problems. It's so easy to set up and use, as it plugs into the computer. It's very sturdy and also folds up to save space. I'm very happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice clear image. Easy to set up and use. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I expected
reviews.reviewText: The camera works great and does what I need as a classroom teacher!! I love the adjustability and the different lighting options. Quality is good especially for the price. Only things I would change would be making the cord a bit longer and the base a bit wider. It’s super light, which makes it great for storing and transporting, but the small base makes it easy to shift or knock over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good document camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: The camera is easy to use and give a good quality picture. It is easy to use. I like the fact that it has a 3-level light also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and use! Many options for use as well! I am an art teacher and this makes teaching techniques so much easier. I am glad I purchased it.

reviews.reviewText: Fast shipping, super easy set up, quality product!!
Easy to use. Great image. Compatible with existing devices.Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Superb Quality at a Reasonable Price... Highly Recommended!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have to admit, I was a little sceptical at first, when I saw the price of this visualiser/document camera, compared to others, that were five times the price! However, I was pleasantly surprised. The packaging is a little flimsy, but more than adequate to protect the camera.Various people have commented about it not having instructions... as you'll see from the video, instructions were included in the box.Although built from plastic, the arm is sturdy, rigid, easy to position, and stays put. There's a small screwdriver, included in the base, to tighten/loosen the joints if required, although this wasn't necessary for me. The base is sufficiently weighted, to prevent it from toppling over, unless you significantly extend the reach of the camera arm.The video is very high quality and the camera auto adjusts based on the lighting conditions. The light doesn't seem very bright, but when tested in a completely dark room, it still performed very well (on full brightness). The autofocus is based on the position of the camera when activated, so needs refocusing (with the press of a button) if the height of the camera is adjusted. In some ways, this is an advantage, as it can be distracting when a camera is constantly refocusing each time you move your hands.The other buttons flip/mirror the video either horizontally or vertically, as required, and adjust the video brightness. The brightness of the lamp can be set on one of three levels, or turned off, by touching the ring light.It worked straight out of the box, without needing to instal any additional software or drivers. I used the 'Camera' app on Windows 11 to record the video. It folds up very compactly and is ideal if you need to present in different locations.I've not measured the size of the shooting area, but the camera wasn't fully extended in the video and the green mat is slightly bigger than A4. So, it's likely close to A3 in size. Greater areas can be achieved, by raising the camera on a box or shelf.In summary, it’s easy to set up, portable and performs very well, especially at this price point. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: Facile da installare, multifunzionale, ottima qualità video-foto
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Le motivazioni che spingono ad acquistare un visualizzare per documenti possono essere varie , personalmente li considero quasi indispensabili per far fronte a diverse esigenze , come ad esempio il trasferimento delle pagine di un libro su un sistema smart , oppure per creare documenti ed ecc. È molto simile ad uno scanner , con la differenza che qui il file non viene salvato in PDF in automatico ma richiede un editing successivo , ma per il resto la sua funzionalità è molto simile.Arriva perfettamente imballato, all'interno della confezione troviamo il visualizzatore e un adattatore usb to usb type-c, per chi ad esempio non ha porte usb disponibili ( come nel caso dei Mac) , molto semplice da utilizzare in quanto è letteralmente un sorta di play and pug , infatti basta semplicemente collegarlo al PC, successivamente aprire la fotocamera e selezionare camera usb , nulla di più semplice , anzi risulta più difficile da spiegare che a farsi.Per l'acquisizione delle immagini , è necessario poggiare su una superficie piana il libro o quello che vogliamo trasferire ( formaro A3- A4) , scegliere inquadratura, luminosità e avviare l'acquisizione, come potete vedere anche dal video allegato , la qualità d'immagine è alquanto elevata ( Full HD ) , ben dettagliate e rifinita , andando ben oltre le mie aspettative.Come scritto nel titolo della recensione, è un visualizzatore multifunzionale, infatti non solo può essere usato come strumento di acquisizione delle immagini, ma può essere usato anche come " proiettore " d'immagini e infine come webcam , essendo dotato anche di microfono ed è perfettamente compatibile con skype , google meet e microsoft teams e zoom , per cui completo , versatile e multifunzionale.Sul pannello vi è la possibilità di selezionare l'intensità della luce , quest'ultima può essere regolata anche in modo touch direttamente sulla lampada , regolare l'angolazione dell'immagine, capovolgere ed ecc.Il supporto aderisce bene alla superficie, la lampada può essere regolata fino a 180 gradi , per cui in grado di soddisfare diverse esigenze d'utilizzo.Acquistato ad un prezzo, a mio avviso, molto contenuto e competitivo e considerando sia l'ottima qualità costruttiva che la sua multifunzionalità vi è di base anche un ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo.Spero di esservi stato utile. 👋

reviews.reviewTitle: Un scan de document performant et efficace
reviews.reviewText: J'ai du déménager dans le cadre de mon travail et je n'ai plus mon environnement de travail. Il arrive que je doive envoyer des scans de mes documents à l'administration et mon téléphone atteint souvent ses limites.C'est la raison pour laquelle j'ai décidé d'investir dans ce scanner de document.Le produit arrive dans une simple boite en carton, avec un adaptateur USB-A vers USB-C et une notice multilingue, rien d'autres. Les fans d'écologies pourront apprécier la non-sur-utilisation de matériaux d'emballage.Ce scanner est vraiment puissant. C'est une webcam montée sur un bras articulé avec en plus une lampe d'éclairage.Cette lampe est sensitive, il suffit d'appuyer sur la surface en plastique pour qu'elle s'allume, pas de bouton rien. Il y a 3 niveaux de puissance.Sur le dessus de la tête, on retrouve des boutons qui permettent d'inverser l'image et de faire l'autofocus sur le sujet. Rapide et puissant.L'installation est juste inexistante, on branche la caméra sur l'ordinateur, on ouvre le logiciel caméra et on appuie sur le bouton, et paf, une nouvelle photo ! Pas de chichi.Le fabricant a même mis en ligne une vidéo pour montrer le mode d'emploi que l'on peut retrouver sur youtube (THUSTAR Document camera).Petit truc en plus ça sera la petite partie en métal au niveau du pied de la caméra. En réalité, si on tire dessus, on se rend compte que c'est un tout petit tournevis qui permet de resserrer les articulations en cas de besoin. C'est le petit truc en plus qui fait tout. Simple et efficace.Bref, ce produit peut être utiliser pour faire tout et m'importe quoi, que ce soit de la simple webcam pour une réunion sur Teams, prendre un document ou même prendre en photo un objet... On branche et la photo est prise. J'en suis content et il répond à mon besoin premier.Le produit ne présente pas de défauts apparents et il correspond à sa fiche. N'hesitez pas à dire si mon commentaire est utile.

Mi hijo necesitaba un escáner práctico, multiusos y que pudiera llevar a todas partes. Así que nos decantamos por este modelo y está muy contento con él, porque no solo puede usarlo como escáner, sino que además hace fotos, vídeos y se puede utilizar como pizarra, cuando abres el programa "cámara" que por defecto viene con windows en el pc. Su manejo es muy intuitivo. Después de estirarlo para escanear, en la parte de arriba, por abajo, tiene una luz, que se puede encender y cambiar a más o menos iluminación según sea preciso. En la parte superior hay un comando de mandos, el del centro sirve para enfocar y los de los lados para mover hacia un lado u otro la imagen en el pc. Los de la parte superior e inferior también sirven para regular la iluminación. El uso es sencillo, hay que enchufar el escáner al pc, en mi caso es windows, pero también sirve para apple. Una vez encendido, se busca en windows la opción "cámara". Una vez que ya tienes preparado el documento en la mesa, comienzas el proceso de centrado. Esto cuesta hasta que te haces al aparato, pero en las instrucciones viene el enlace a un vídeo donde se muestra el funcionamiento, aunque no es demasiado claro... Una vez que ya aparece todo el documento en la pantalla del pc, puedes hacer foto, vídeo, escanearlo o incluso utilizar como pizarra interactiva. Desde luego, para su precio y lo pequeño que es tiene muchas funciones. Además, desde la tienda me han enviado unos consejos de uso, porque, como digo, al principio cuesta un poco hacerse con el uso, que os pongo por aquí para que sirva de ayuda: Te compartimos algunos consejos, puedes seguir los pasos a continuación, gracias.La cámara de documentos se instala automáticamente con el controlador, solo necesita conectar la cámara de documentos a la computadora, luego abrir el software correspondiente y seleccionar "Cámara USB" para usarla.En general, existe una variedad de sistemas informáticos, y los métodos para utilizar estos sistemas son los siguientes:1. Sistema Mac:1). Si necesita grabar un video, busque "Quick Time Player" en su computadora.2). Si necesita tomar una foto, busque en su computadora "Photo Booth"2. Sistema Windows 10: puede abrir directamente la "cámara usb" que viene con el sistema para usar. Si su computadora es una computadora portátil, también debe seleccionar "Cambiar cámara" en la esquina superior derecha de la computadora portátil.3. Sistema Windows XP/7/8 y otros sistemas: si su sistema no puede encontrar ningún software, consulte la página 7 del manual "Sistema Windows XP/7/8", contáctenos, le enviaremos el software.Si no conoce el método de operación, puede ir a You-Tu-be para buscar "Kitchbai Document camera - MacBook operation method" o "Kitchbai Document camera - Windows 10 operation method" para ver el video.
